name: Sharx
description: A fearsome shark warrior wielding ice-crystal blades. Its crystalline armor glows with arctic power, making it a devastating physical attacker.

ability.name: Frozen Fury
ability.description: Physical attacks have 20% chance to freeze. Attack increases by 50% when below 30% HP.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.description: Bites with ice-cold fangs. May freeze or cause flinching.

moves.name: Liquidation
moves.description: Slams into the target with water. May lower defense.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: An ice-cold punch that may freeze the target.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: Crunches with sharp teeth. May lower defense.

habitat: Frozen Arctic seas and ice caverns
